parameter.expression: SELECT DISTINCT CODCID AS VALUE, NOMECID AS LABEL FROM TSICID WHERE AD_MAPEARCIDADE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1

chart.title: $TITULO
chart.expression: SELECT CID.CODCID, CID.NOMECID,to_char(H.DATAPREVISAO, 'dd/MM') AS DATA,TO_CHAR(H.DATAPREVISAO, ' hh24:mi') AS HORA,H.VELOCIDADEVENTO AS VARIAVEL,'INTENSIDADE DOS VENTOS' AS NOME, 'A' AS TITULO FROM AD_PRETEMH H, TSICID CID WHERE H.CODCID = CID.CODCID AND H.CODCID = :CODCID AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 1, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 3, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)),5, 6)),9,9)) = 1 AND TO_CHAR(H.DATAPREVISAO) = TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 1, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 3, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)),5, 6)),1,8)) UNION ALL SELECT CID.CODCID, CID.NOMECID,to_char(H.DATAPREVISAO, 'dd/MM') AS DATA,TO_CHAR(H.DATAPREVISAO, ' hh24:mi') AS HORA,H.TEMPERATURA,'TEMPERATURA' AS NOME,'B' AS TITULO FROM AD_PRETEMH H, TSICID CID WHERE H.CODCID = CID.CODCID AND H.CODCID = :CODCID AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 1, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 3, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)),5, 6)),9,9)) = 2 AND TO_CHAR(H.DATAPREVISAO) = TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 1, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 3, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)),5, 6)),1,8)) UNION ALL SELECT CID.CODCID, CID.NOMECID,to_char(H.DATAPREVISAO, 'dd/MM') AS DATA,TO_CHAR(H.DATAPREVISAO, ' hh24:mi') AS HORA,H.PRECIPITACAOCHUVA, 'CHUVA' AS NOME,'C' AS TITULO FROM AD_PRETEMH H, TSICID CID WHERE H.CODCID = CID.CODCID AND H.CODCID = :CODCID AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 1, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 3, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)),5, 6)),9,9)) = 3 AND TO_CHAR(H.DATAPREVISAO) = TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 1, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)), 3, 2)||'/'||SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LPAD(:P_DATA,7,0)),5, 6)),1,8)) ORDER BY 4
